title: Build interior design project management application with comprehensive workflow

requirements.text: Create user authentication system with registration, login, and role-based access control supporting three roles: admin, manager, and designer
acceptanceCriteria: Users can register with email and password
Users can log in and receive authentication token
Three distinct roles exist: admin, manager, designer with different permission levels
Authentication state persists across sessions

requirements.text: Implement project management system where each project contains client data, timeline, budget, documentation, and complete material specifications
acceptanceCriteria: Projects can be created with name, client, timeline, and initial budget
Each project stores client information, schedule, budget, and documentation references
Projects support multiple status states
Projects can be retrieved, updated, and deleted

requirements.text: Create room-based organization within projects where each room can have assigned products, costs, and notes specific to that space
acceptanceCriteria: Each project can contain multiple rooms
Rooms have names and descriptions
Products and costs can be assigned to specific rooms
Room-specific notes can be added

requirements.text: Build shopping list module supporting three input methods: manual entry with all product details (name, image URL, price, shop, link, availability), import from a reusable product library, and placeholder for future external shop integration
acceptanceCriteria: Products can be added manually with name, image URL, price, shop name, product link, and availability status
A reusable product library exists for frequently used items
Products can be copied from the library to project shopping lists
Each product has quantity, realization status, category, and space for alternative suggestions

requirements.text: Implement automatic budget calculation system that computes costs in real-time for entire project, individual rooms, and product categories (furniture, lighting, finishing materials, appliances, decorations) with budget overage warnings
acceptanceCriteria: Budget is automatically calculated from shopping list items
Total project budget is displayed
Per-room budget breakdown is available
Per-category budget (furniture, lighting, materials, appliances, decorations) is calculated
System alerts when budget is exceeded

requirements.text: Create task management system for tracking design, ordering, and realization tasks with deadlines, status tracking, and notes
acceptanceCriteria: Tasks can be created with title, description, due date, and status
Tasks are linked to specific projects
Task statuses can be updated (pending, in progress, completed)
Tasks support notes and comments

requirements.text: Implement client CRM module with contact database storing client information, contact history, notes, and project associations
acceptanceCriteria: Client records contain name, email, phone, and address
Contact history can be logged with timestamps
Notes can be added to client records
Clients can be linked to one or more projects

requirements.text: Build logistics tracking system where products transition through statuses: planned, ordered, in transit, delivered, and installed with full visibility of current state
acceptanceCriteria: Products in shopping lists support status field
Five distinct statuses exist: planned, ordered, in transit, delivered, installed
Product status can be updated through workflow
Status history is maintained

requirements.text: Create moodboard module where inspiration boards can be built with items directly linked to products in the shopping list, showing real budget impact
acceptanceCriteria: Moodboards can be created for projects
Moodboard items link to actual shopping list products
Each moodboard displays total cost of included items
Moodboards support images and descriptions

requirements.text: Implement client portal access control allowing designers to share selected project elements (visualizations, moodboards, product lists, budget) with clients for approval and commenting
acceptanceCriteria: Client users can be granted limited access to specific projects
Sharing permissions can be configured per project element type
Clients can view but not edit shared content
Clients can leave comments on shared items

requirements.text: Build project dashboard displaying comprehensive project overview including client data, timeline, budget status, room breakdown, and material specifications
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard shows project name, client, and key dates
Budget summary with spent vs. planned is visible
List of rooms with their individual budgets is displayed
Recent activity and upcoming tasks are shown
Navigation to detailed project sections is available

requirements.text: Create shopping list interface with product cards showing image, name, price, shop, link, quantity, status, and category with ability to add, edit, and remove items
acceptanceCriteria: Products display in card or list format with all key information
Add product form supports all fields: name, image URL, price, shop, link, availability, quantity, category
Products can be edited inline or via modal
Products can be deleted with confirmation
Products can be filtered by category and status

requirements.text: Implement room management interface where rooms can be added to projects, edited, and have products and costs assigned to them with per-room budget display
acceptanceCriteria: Rooms can be created with name and description
Room list shows name and total cost
Clicking a room shows products assigned to that room
Products can be assigned to rooms via dropdown or drag-and-drop
Room budget calculation is displayed

requirements.text: Build budget overview page with automatic calculations showing total project cost, per-room breakdown, per-category breakdown (furniture, lighting, materials, appliances, decorations), and visual indicators for budget overages
acceptanceCriteria: Total project budget and spent amount are prominently displayed
Budget bar shows percentage used with visual warning if exceeded
Room-by-room cost breakdown is shown in table or chart
Category breakdown (furniture, lighting, materials, appliances, decorations) is displayed
Overage warnings appear when budget is exceeded

requirements.text: Create task management interface displaying project tasks with deadlines, statuses, and notes, allowing users to add, update status, and complete tasks
acceptanceCriteria: Tasks are displayed in list or kanban board format
Task cards show title, due date, and status
Users can add new tasks with all required fields
Task status can be changed via dropdown or drag-and-drop
Overdue tasks are visually highlighted
Task details can be expanded to view/edit notes

requirements.text: Implement client portal view with read-only access to shared project elements where clients can view moodboards, product lists, budget summaries, and leave comments without editing
acceptanceCriteria: Client users see only projects shared with them
Shared elements (moodboards, products, budget) are clearly displayed
All data is read-only for client users
Comment box is available on shared items
Client comments are visible to designer

requirements.text: Build moodboard creation and viewing interface where users can assemble inspiration boards with items linked to actual shopping list products, showing real-time budget impact
acceptanceCriteria: Moodboards can be created with title and description
Items can be added to moodboard by linking to shopping list products
Each item shows thumbnail and price
Total moodboard cost is calculated and displayed
Moodboard can be shared with clients

requirements.text: Create logistics tracking view showing product order status pipeline from planned through ordered, in transit, delivered, to installed with ability to update status and view which items need attention
acceptanceCriteria: Products are displayed grouped by status
Status pipeline is visually represented (e.g., columns or timeline)
Users can update product status via dropdown or drag-and-drop
Items requiring attention are highlighted
Filter by status is available

requirements.text: Implement client management interface for CRM module with list of clients, detail view showing contact information, project associations, contact history, and notes
acceptanceCriteria: Client list displays names and contact information
Client detail view shows full profile with all fields
Associated projects are listed and clickable
Contact history timeline is displayed
Notes can be added and viewed

requirements.text: Build product library interface for managing reusable products where users can add frequently used items with all details and quickly copy them to project shopping lists
acceptanceCriteria: Product library displays saved products with images and key details
Users can add products to library with all fields
Products can be searched and filtered
Copy to project button adds product to current project's shopping list
Library products can be edited and deleted

requirements.text: Create authentication pages for registration and login with form validation and error handling
acceptanceCriteria: Registration form collects email, password, name, and role
Login form collects email and password
Client-side validation provides immediate feedback
Error messages display for invalid credentials or registration failures
Successful login redirects to main dashboard

requirements.text: Implement project list view showing all projects with key information (name, client, budget status, deadline) and ability to create new projects and navigate to project details
acceptanceCriteria: All projects are listed with name, client, budget status, and deadline
Create project button opens form for new project
Projects can be clicked to open detailed view
Projects can be filtered and sorted
Budget status indicators show green/yellow/red based on usage

requirements.text: Design a minimalist, professional visual theme with neutral colors, clean typography, and consistent spacing that works for desktop and mobile, avoiding blue and purple unless specified
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses neutral tones (grays, whites, earth tones) as primary colors
Typography is clean and professional
Layout is spacious with clear visual hierarchy
Interface is responsive for desktop and mobile devices
Design conveys professionalism suitable for design industry

constraints: Use only Motoko for backend implementation (no Python, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, or external databases)
Use only React with TypeScript for frontend (no Vue, Angular, or other frameworks)
Do not use external authentication services like Auth0 or social logins
Do not implement Docker, microservices, or PostgreSQL as these are not supported
Do not integrate with external APIs for product scraping from online stores
Do not implement real-time features like WebSockets or live chat
Do not implement email services or SMS notifications
Backend must use single-actor architecture in main.mo
Do not edit immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity files, useActor.ts, main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: PDF generation for invoices, offers, and shopping lists (deferred)
Invoice and VAT management features (out of scope for MVP)
KSeF Polish e-invoicing system integration (not applicable)
Business intelligence dashboard with revenue/cost/profit analytics (deferred)
Intelligent suggestions module for cheaper alternatives and budget analysis (deferred)
Automated reminders and notifications for tasks and deadlines (deferred)
Mobile-specific native app versions (responsive web is sufficient)
Document archiving for invoices and receipts (deferred)
Multi-tenant SaaS architecture with organization isolation (single-user focus for MVP)
Actual product import from external online stores (placeholder only)
Light/dark mode toggle (consistent light theme for MVP)
